ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( if( RecordTypeId = "012a0000001NZsU", true, false), if( RecordTypeId ="012a0000001NZsV", true, false),if( RecordTypeId = "01213000001NdrN", true, false)),NOT(OR(ShippingState = "dolnośląskie",ShippingState = "kujawsko-pomorskie",ShippingState = "lubelskie",ShippingState = "lubuskie",ShippingState = "łódzkie",ShippingState = "małopolskie",ShippingState = "mazowieckie",ShippingState = "opolskie",ShippingState = "podkarpackie",ShippingState = "podlaskie",ShippingState = "pomorskie",ShippingState = "śląskie",ShippingState = "świętokrzyskie",ShippingState = "warmińsko-mazurskie",ShippingState = "wielkopolskie",ShippingState = "zachodniopomorskie")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
Wpisz poprawnie województwo:
dolnośląskie, kujawsko-pomorskie, lubelskie, lubuskie, łódzkie, małopolskie, mazowieckie, opolskie, podkarpackie, podlaskie, pomorskie, śląskie, świętokrzyskie, warmińsko-mazurskie, wielkopolskie, zachodniopomorskie
